name: Steady Birds
description:
Oh no! The tree is about to crash to the ground! Try to keep it up for as long as you can.

  • Tap/click the birds to make them change side and help you keep the balance
  • Tap/click the branches to make them break and scare the beavers
  • Tap/click the beehive to ask the bear for some help
  • Tap/click the owl to attract more birds

How long can you last?

Credits:

  • Art and animations by Filip Grudziel
  • Programming by Guillaume Brunerie
  • Music and sounds from a Humble Bundle of music and sound effects
